GeneDef.label: shared thoughts
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Due to which they share some of their thoughts.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, it synchronizes the <color=#8a8ae6>memories</color>.
Only <color=#8a8ae6>temporary memories</color> are synchronized, permanent ones are not affected.

GeneDef.label: shared opinion
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a psychic connection with other carriers. Thanks to this, they have a much better opinion of each other.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Every day or when a new mind is added, the hive gets an <color=#8a8ae6>opinion offset</color> lasting about a day.
Affects the hive's opinion with the <color=#8a8ae6>carrier</color> and the <color=#8a8ae6>carrier's opinion with the hive</color>, without affecting the opinion between other pawns of the hive.

GeneDef.label: hive maker
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can resurrect and implant a germline into a dead person through a somewhat gross-looking injector organ. The victim receives the desired set of genes, inherits some of the caster's genes, and loses skills and backstory.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Target gets the <color=#8a8ae6>selected geneset</color>, <color=#8a8ae6>caster skills</color>, <color=#8a8ae6>random caster genes</color> and <color=#8a8ae6>loses backstory</color>.

AbilityDef.label: hive maker
AbilityDef.description: Implant a copy of choosen germline into dead person through a somewhat gross-looking injector organ.\n\n<color=#f5ffa2>Tip:</color> Right click me.
